definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of histamine on the intestinal mucosal barrier function.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討組胺對腸粘膜屏障功能的影響。

sentences.english: In the process, the body produces more histamines.
sentences.chinese: 在這個過程中，人體產生了大量的組胺。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of an antihistamine, diphenhydramine on the memory of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察抗組胺藥苯海拉明對小鼠記憶的影響。

sentences.english: Antihistamine have already widely been used in clinic to cure allergic disease.
sentences.chinese: 抗組胺藥物治療過敏性疾病已廣泛地應用於臨牀。

sentences.english: Histamine reactions were produced by the presence of germs.
sentences.chinese: 組胺反應是病菌引起的。

sentences.english: Use antihistamine and decongestants as necessary and as tolerated .
sentences.chinese: 應用必須且能耐受的抗組胺劑和減充血劑。

sentences.english: One of the ways to control the allergic reactions is with an antihistamine.
sentences.chinese: 的方法來控制過敏反應，其一是一種抗組胺劑。

sentences.english: Another good tip is to lie down in your bunk as sleeping lowers your levels of histamines.
sentences.chinese: 也可以躺在牀鋪上，因爲睡眠可以降低組胺水平。

sentences.english: Histamine is a substance produced by the body as part of its defence mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 組胺是機體作爲防禦機制的一部分產生的一種物質。

sentences.english: Antihistaminic agents may control the atropine conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 這種由阿托品引起的結膜炎，可用抗組胺類藥物控制。

sentences.english: Helps balance histamine release and clears stuffy noses in three days or less.
sentences.chinese: 有助於平衡組胺釋放，三天或三天內時噢你鼻腔通暢。

sentences.english: Effect of histamine on the intestinal mucosal barrier function.
sentences.chinese: 組胺對腸粘膜屏障功能的影響。

sentences.english: There are antihistamines, like Benadryl , which have a sedative side effect.
sentences.chinese: 它們是一些抗組胺劑，具有鎮靜劑一般的副作用。

sentences.english: She tried decongestants, antihistamines and steroid nasal sprays.
sentences.chinese: 她也試過減充血劑，抗組胺藥和類固醇鼻噴劑。

sentences.english: There were no dose-dependent effect of histamine release.
sentences.chinese: 兩組均無劑量依賴性的組胺釋放作用。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: see 郎格罕氏島|郎格罕氏岛[Lang2 ge2 han3 shi4 dao3]
